name: FAudioOutputDeviceInfo
doc: Platform audio output device info, in a Blueprint-readable format

Name: FString
The name of the audio device
NumChannels: The number of channels supported by the audio device
SampleRate: The sample rate of the audio device
Format: The data format of the audio stream
OutputChannelArray: The output channel array of the audio device
bIsSystemDefault: Whether or not this device is the system default
bIsCurrentDevice: Whether or not this device is the device currently in use
